|zh                 = 
;今天是香菱的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''旅行者：'''香菱，生日快乐！这是给你带的新食材。
:'''香菱：'''哇真是太感谢了，今天我也有准备特别料理招待大家哦！
:'''辛焱：'''哈哈，已经有点期待了！
:'''香菱：'''这可是我苦心研制、加了泡泡桔的新菜品&mdash;&mdash;待会请务必多尝两口~
:'''派蒙：'''火……火！香菱，锅要爆炸啦！
:'''旅行者：'''快！派蒙，接住那个盘子&mdash;&mdash;
:'''派蒙：'''要接不住啦！！！！！
|dialogue_review_zh = 「这可是我苦心研制、加了泡泡桔的新菜品——待会请务必多尝两口~」
|en                 = 
;Today is [[Xiangling]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Traveler:''' Happy birthday, Xiangling! We brought you a new ingredient.
:'''Xiangling:''' Wow, thank you so much! I cooked up a few special dishes for everyone today too!
:'''Xinyan''' Haha, I already can't wait! 
:'''Xiangling:''' This new dish uses [[Bulle Fruit]] as an ingredient &mdash; I came up with it after a lot of hard work and testing! Please have a taste later~
:'''Paimon''' F&mdash;Fire! Xiangling, the wok's about to explode!
:'''Traveler:''' Quick! Paimon, catch the plate&mdash;
:'''Paimon''' Paimon can't do it!!!
|dialogue_review_en = "This new dish uses Bulle Fruit as an ingredient &mdash; I came up with it after a lot of hard work and testing! Please have a taste later~"
